name: workbench
description: A simple desktop app built on Electron to allow end-users to combine their suite of tools into one location

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . workbench --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icons/WorkbenchLogo.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=Define LLC --version-string.FileDescription=Combine your suite of tools in one --version-string.ProductName="Workbench"

author: Ethan Cook
